title: England v New Zealand, Rugby World Cup 2019 player ratings: Who shone and who struggled?
text:
England will contest the final of Rugby World Cup 2019 after a bristling, clinical performance swept them to a 19-7 victory that ended New Zealand's reign as champions.

But who shone on an intense night in Yokohama? Here, we run the rule over both teams.

England

15. Elliot Daly

Burned past Mo'unga prior to Tuilagi's try and his positioning was secure enough to deal with New Zealand's kicking game before he moved to the left wing 8

14. Anthony Watson

Extremely lively on both sides of the ball, using the touchline intelligently in defence and showing off sparky footwork in attack. Also stood firm at the all-important restarts 9
description: England will contest the final of Rugby World Cup 2019 after a bristling, clinical performance swept them to a 19-7 victory that ended New Zealand's reign as champions.
